ygData.subject: Re: cured silk and other delights
ygData.msgSnippet: Got my Wu s Fighting Gauntlets yesterday -- they re cool.  Nice to gain a slot in the inventory and they work as a lightsource even if you just place them in
ygData.messageBody:
Got my Wu's Fighting Gauntlets yesterday -- they're cool. Nice to gain a
slot in the inventory and they work as a lightsource even if you just place
them in your inventory.


-----Original Message-----
From: Dizzy J. <dizzyj@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, October 10, 1999 1:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] cured silk and other delights
